Added quick way to post your photos to discover so that you can compete in daily prize giveaways
Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Learns your price points as you shop more!
- Better gender identification! By default, we will assume gender of the item in the image, and you can override this at anytime using filters.
- Performance improvements for stability and speed!
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Big news this release. We've been working on this day and night, and we're excited to finally offer you for the first time your very own AI personal stylist!
Online shopping can be daunting, especially if you're looking for one very specific type of style. Rather than search for "floral dress", it might be easier just to snap a photo and we will do the rest. We all have our own personal taste and style. It’s kind of hard to describe it to a search bar.

1. Get inspired and mix your style with shopping filters we provide.
2. Start by uploading a look you love.
3. Explore different items in your look.
4. Shop your taste by applying color, category, or celebrity style filters. You can save them and shop away..

Yes - you know which colors or celeb styles are your go to this season- but in TRUTH - what you LOVE best is YOUR STYLE. And all you want to do sometimes is say I need a dress with THIS fit and pattern - can you mix a little bit of my favorite influencer style into it!


We love to hear from you - please email us ANYTIME:
Hello@screenshopit.com

Cheers,
The Screenshop Team

Thanks for using Screenshop.

We fixed and polished a few things behind the scenes to make it easier for you to shop and explore your inspirations. Here are a couple of enhancements you’ll find in the latest update:

- Shop everything you see on the discover section using Screenshop button
- Stay engaged with latest Style Lens offerings.
- Various bug fixes and improvements.

Stay tuned for more updates, and be sure to share your feedback at hello@screenshopit.com

Fix congrats popup translation on Spanish
New lenses! See products based on your local weather, and see what's popular in your nearest city. We squashed some bugs, too.
New lenses to help you identify similar products, ranked by affordability! Plus various other bug squishings and polish.
Bug fixes and some tweaks to our new weather and city features!
Our next generation AI, to power your matches and inspiration!

You can now buy from within the app! This has been a long time coming, and we're excited to make your visual search and shopping even easier than it was before. Thanks for using Screenshop, and have fun shopping!

You can now buy from within the app! This has been a long time coming, and we're excited to make your visual search and shopping even easier than it was before. We also added Hindi support for our friends in India!

Thanks for using Screenshop, and have fun shopping!
Lots of bug fixes and speed improvements!
Thanks for using Screenshop! This version unifies our menu and adds some other simplifications to the UI to make your matching even simpler.
Minor UI tweaks
A whole new design, to make it easier than ever to find what you're looking for.
Section name changes and bug fixes

1. Added Home Screen Widget
2. Added Suggested Screenshots to the Initial Screenshop view
3. Switched to using onboard ML model for processing screenshots
New fashion detection for screenshots.
